word_mean: 航空器或部件通过检测、校正、修复或换件，以达到被批准的性能指标的修理。

sentence.Network_en: The report recommends an overhaul of public finances.
sentence.Network_cn: 该报告建议对公共财政进行彻底改革。

sentence.Network_en: Overhaul your body with a cleansing detox.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过清洁排毒法对身体进行“大扫除”。

sentence.Network_en: It is generally appreciated that the rail network needs a complete overhaul.
sentence.Network_cn: 众所周知,铁路系统需要大检修.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (originally in nautical use in the sense 'release (rope tackle) by slackening'): from over- + haul

entry.tran: 大修；彻底检修；全面检查
entry.def: If a piece of equipment is overhauled, it is cleaned, checked thoroughly, and repaired if necessary.

example.ex: They had ensured the plumbing was overhauled a year ago...
example.tran: 他们曾保证水管一年前彻底检修过。

example.ex: Our car was towed away to have its suspension overhauled.
example.tran: 我们的车被拖走了，要对悬架进行大修。

entry.tran: 对…进行彻底革新；全面修订
entry.def: If you overhaul a system or method, you examine it carefully and make many changes in it in order to improve it.

example.ex: The government said it wanted to overhaul the employment training scheme to make it cost effective...
example.tran: 政府表示希望彻底改革就业培训计划以实现低成本高效益。

example.ex: The legal system needs to be overhauled.
example.tran: 有必要对这套法律体系进行全面修正。

entry.tran: （尤指在体育比赛中）赶上，超过，超越
entry.def: If someone overhauls a person who is ahead of them, especially in a sports competition, they pass them or become more successful than them.

example.ex: Argentina need to beat Peru by at least four goals to overhaul Brazil and reach the final itself...
example.tran: 阿根廷队至少要赢秘鲁队4球才能超越巴西队进入决赛。

example.ex: Beattie led for several laps before he was overhauled by Itoh.
example.tran: 比蒂在被伊藤赶超之前，曾有几圈一直处于领先。

means.word_mean: 1. periodic maintenance on a car or machine;

sentences.sentence: "it was time for an overhaul on the tractor"
"The sports car passed all the trucks"

auth_sentence.content: Rather, the entire healthcare system needs an overhaul.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rather, the entire healthcare system needs an overhaul.

auth_sentence.content: It recommended a major overhaul of UN peacekeeping operations.
auth_sentence.res_content: It recommended a major overhaul of UN peacekeeping operations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It recommended a major overhaul of UN peacekeeping operations.

auth_sentence.content: You argue for an overhaul of our energy system.
auth_sentence.res_content: You argue for an overhaul of our energy system.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You argue for an overhaul of our energy system.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火

sentences.en: A mechanic overhauled the car’s motor with some new parts.
sentences.cn: 一个修理工对那辆汽车的发动机进行了彻底的检修,换了一些新部件。

sentences.en: The express overhauled a goods train.
It is generally appreciated that the rail network needs a complete overhaul.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，铁路系统需要大检修。
